snippet.title: "We Were Wrong" Disney Rehires Johnny Depp After Beating Amber Heard!
snippet.description:
Disney Publicly Apologized And Rehires Johnny Depp After Winning The Lawsuit Against Amber Heard!

As the seas are starting to calm down after the dubious Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial from 2020, it is now clear to see that Johnny Depp was the victim and big studios are reportedly interested in the actor once again. Disney might have just rehired Johnny Depp to return as Jack Sparrow in Pirates of the Caribbean 6 movie. It is alleged that Walt Disney is standing firmly behind Johnny Depp in his legal battle against his ex-wife Amber Heard despite the company distancing themselves from the actor last year and “blocking him” from returning as a cameo in The Pirates of The Caribbean reboot starring none other than Margot Robbie. But is Johnny actually going to be rehired, or is it all just speculation? And will Johnny's life be back to normal once the whole Amber Heard lawsuit blows over or will this be stuck on him and affect his career until he retires?

✅ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

#JohnnyDepp #Disney #AmberHeard
tags: johnny depp rehired pirates of the caribbean
johnny depp gets hired by disney
